title: Superteam Vietnam December 2023 Newsletter
author: Kelly Anh
content:
State of Superteam Vietnam: December 2023
Superteam Vietnam is a community of founders, builders and creative artists in Vietnam. We focus on nurturing our talents by hosting workshops, providing 1-1 mentorships, and potentially helping connect projects to VCs. Our goal is to raise the quality of Vietnamese builders, specifically on Solana blockchain.

Highlights for the month of December:

- Earn with SuperteamVN attracted 30 builders to come out on a Saturday and learn more about our Instagrant
- SuperteamVN hosted 2 Christmas dinners in Ho Chi Minh & Hanoi with more than 100 people attending
- GDP growth: $11,515 was added this month through Tuan Pham's prize from Solana's RPGF for maintaining Clockwork

Key Metrics & Highlights of the Month

Vietnam 2023 Wrapped
Let's take a look at some important numbers and milestones we've achieved this year!

In total, we've collectively contributed $190,115 to our GDP, with 180 events and 187 projects submitted to Grizzlython and Hyperdrive. Ho Chi Minh City Hacker House in total received 1300 sign ups and final number of 800 attendees. Read more in our post here.

Consumer Hack 11: https://x.com/SuperteamVN/status/1735623639876489330?s=20

Consumer Hack 12: https://x.com/SCILabs_io/status/1735526310779527398?s=20

Xmas Parties with SuperteamVN (Saigon): https://x.com/SuperteamVN/status/1738550602035302583?s=20

Xmas Parties with SuperteamVN (Hanoi): https://x.com/SuperteamVN/status/1739925530122858993?s=20

Earn with Superteam: https://x.com/SuperteamVN/status/1735398037080703148?s=20

Open Clockwork: Congratulations to our beloved DevRel Tuan Pham along with other 10 projects who will share a pool of 250K$ fund from the Solana Retroactive Public Goods Funding (RetroPGF). https://twitter.com/tuanpmhd/status/1729459886596227229

What's Coming Next?

title: Superteam Vietnam January 2024 Newsletter
author: Kelly Anh
content:
State of Superteam Vietnam: January 2024
Superteam Vietnam is a community of founders, builders and creative artists in Vietnam. We focus on nurturing our talents by hosting workshops, providing 1-1 mentorships, and potentially helping connect projects to VCs. Our goal is to raise the quality of Vietnamese builders, specifically on Solana blockchain.

Highlights for the month of January:

Successfully secured 2 solid airdrops of the month, complete our mission as to giving back to the community: Lamas Finance and Saros airdrop

SuperteamVN hosted 2 Year-End Parties in Ho Chi Minh & Hanoi with close to 150 people attending

GDP growth: $16,200 was added from Hack 11 winners, FPT Polytechnic HCM Internship Course #2 and Khac Vy’s devrel position at Shyft

Key Metrics & Highlights of the Month

Airdrop Season is Here
Superteam Vietnam has secured 2 airdrops from our network so that the entire Superteam global can reap the benefits of being a Member!

title: Superteam Vietnam February 2024 Newsletter - English
author: [English Version]
content:
Mar 04, 2024

State of Superteam Vietnam: February 2024
Superteam Vietnam is a community of founders, builders and creative artists in Vietnam. We focus on nurturing our talents by hosting workshops, providing 1-1 mentorships, and potentially helping connect projects to VCs. Our goal is to raise the quality of Vietnamese builders, specifically on Solana blockchain.

Highlights for the month of February:

SuperteamVN hosted 2 Lunar New Year Meet-ups in HCM and Hanoi for 70 builders

GDP growth: $16,200 was added from Hack 12 winners, FPT Polytechnic HCM Internship Course #2 and Khac Vy’s devrel position at Shyft

Kick-off a new chapter of Internship Course at University of Greenwich Ha Noi

Key Metrics & Highlights of the Month

Partnership Extension
In February 2024, Superteam Vietnam extended its partnership to open a new ‘University Internship Course’ at University of Greenwich Vietnam. This is the third university that Superteam Vietnam has partnered with, besides FPT Polytechnic Ho Chi Minh and FPT Polytechnic Ha Noi. Furthermore, as part of the curriculum of the Internship Course, Superteam Vietnam joined and mentored in the ‘Idea Renovation Pitching’ event in FPT Polytechnic HCM and FPT Polytechnic Hanoi.

University of Greenwich Vietnam

title: Superteam Vietnam March 2024 Newsletter - English
content:
State of Superteam Vietnam: March 2024
Superteam Vietnam is a community of founders, builders and creative artists in Vietnam. We focus on nurturing our talents by hosting workshops, providing 1-1 mentorships, and potentially helping connect projects to VCs. Our goal is to raise the quality of Vietnamese builders, specifically on Solana blockchain.

Highlights for the month of March:

Members of SuperteamVN are all granted 100% DISCOUNT on tickets to attend the Southeast Asia Convention 2024 (SEABC2024) with more than 500 attendees

The Solana Buidl Station is back and was happening every week for a total of 5 weeks to support teams competing in the Renaissance hackathon.

The FPT HCM Internship Course has attracted over 300 students and 9 strategic partners, notably among them Esol Labs has offered 15 intern positions with a salary of 3 million VND per month and the opportunity for advancement to full-time staff positions.

Key Metrics & Highlights of the Mont

Solana Ecosystem Call IRL in 3 cities
/Every month, the ecosystem come together/

On March 7, 2024, the Solana SuperteamVN community welcomed a new month full of energy and excitement with an IRL Watch Party activity in Ho Chi Minh City, Hanoi, and Da Nang.

Hồ Chí Minh
Image
Hà Nội
Image
Đà Nẵng
Image
SuperteamVN @ SEABC2024
The SuperteamVN booth was set up at the Southeast Asia Convention 2024, which is the first blockchain event dedicated to the SEA region. At the event, we were able to expand our connections with many new partners, projects, and builders, as well as support everyone participating and answering questions about the Solana Renaissance Hackathon. Most notably, all members of SuperteamVN were granted free tickets.



Image
Solana BUIDL Station
The BUIDL Station will take place every Saturday for Builders to exchange ideas, share, and support project development. At the Station, there will be 2 Dev Rel from SuperteamVN attending to answer any questions. Furthermore, the event has attracted many Builders to participate in the sharing session by Mr. Khắc Vỹ - Dev Rel @ SuperteamVN on the topic of TOKEN EXTENSIONS - an upgrade to the standard SPL token with many new features.

2/3/2024 at The Bunny Cafe

9/3/2024 at La’mars Coffee&TEA
Image
12/3/2024: Pitching Practice (Saigon)

14/3/2024: Pitching Practise (Ha Noi)
Image
23/3/2024 tại SR Group (Venue sponsor: SR Group)

ETHVN Side Event
SuperteamVN, in collaboration with ETHVN, organized several exciting events throughout the month, including: Web3 Builders Drinks (with approximately 150 attendees) and Wormhole Luncheon.

Wormhole Luncheon
Image
Image
Web3 Builders Drinks
Image
Image
Ecosystem Chats on Twitter Space
With Orca
Image
With Wormhole
Image
With Coin68

NFT Meet-up: Saigon & Tell #5
[hosted with Superteam Germany & Vietnam Creator DAO]

Job Fair 2024: Future of Work in Web3
The job fair organized by FPT Polytechnic HCM and Solana Superteam Vietnam took place on Saturday, March 23, 2024, at FPT University HCMC. The event attracted over 300 students and 9 enterprises seeking talent.

This collaboration not only provides learning and practical opportunities for students but also contributes to enhancing the capabilities of builders and developers in Vietnam.

This clearly shows that the work of Solana Superteam Vietnam goes beyond just strengthening the abilities of Vietnamese builders and developers; it is also an effort to bring more opportunities and income to the community.

Image
Image
Solana Consumer Hack 13
Solana Consumer Hack 13 was sponsored by @SuperteamVN and @KaopizOfficial, organized by @WearebuildersVN and the Computer Science Department at Phenikaa University.

Image
Image
Series: The More You Know
As part of the Global Renaissance Hackathon by @ColosseumOrg, we conducted a series of interviews with participating teams, covering a variety of topics from Gaming to Payment. The series is still ongoing, and everyone can follow SuperteamVN’s Twitter for updates!!!
